languages.text: "Пока есть время, не могли бы вы пробраться к топке и вытащить контейнер с имплантами? Делим товар поровну, вы даже можете выбрать перв{mf|ым|ой}! Только умоляю — поспешите! Совсем скоро гроб со старым Беллардо отправят по адресу и... пух! Он обратится в пепел, а с ним и бесценная аугментика!"

traits.locale_text: "Пока есть время, не могли бы вы пробраться к топке и вытащить контейнер с имплантами? Делим товар поровну, вы даже можете выбрать перв{mf|ым|ой}! Только умоляю — поспешите! Совсем скоро гроб со старым Беллардо отправят по адресу и... пух! Он обратится в пепел, а с ним и бесценная аугментика!"

languages.text: "While there's still time, could you please get to the furnace and pull the container with implants out of there? We'll split the goods fifty-fifty, you can even have first pick! Just please, hurry! They'll soon be putting the coffin with old Bellardo where it belongs, and then... poof! It will be reduced to ash, and my priceless augmetics along with it!"
languages.original_text: "Пока есть время, не могли бы вы пробраться к топке и вытащить контейнер с имплантами? Делим товар поровну, вы даже можете выбрать перв{mf|ым|ой}! Только умоляю — поспешите! Совсем скоро гроб со старым Беллардо отправят по адресу и... пух! Он обратится в пепел, а с ним и бесценная аугментика!"

traits.locale_text: "While there's still time, could you please get to the furnace and pull the container with implants out of there? We'll split the goods fifty-fifty, you can even have the first pick! Just please, hurry! They're soon going to put the coffin with old Bellardo where it belongs, and then... poof! It will turn to ashes, and my priceless augmetics with it!"

"While there's still time, could you please get to the furnace and pull the container with implants out of there? We'll split the goods fifty-fifty, you can even have the first pick! Just please, hurry! They're soon going to put the coffin with old Bellardo where it belongs, and then... poof! It will turn to ashes, and my priceless augmetics with it!"

"While there's still time, could you please get to the furnace and pull the container with implants out of there? We'll split the goods fifty-fifty, you can even have first pick! Just please, hurry! They'll soon be putting the coffin with old Bellardo where it belongs, and then... poof! It will be reduced to ash, and my priceless augmetics along with it!"

"While there's still time, could you please get to the furnace and pull the container with implants out of there? We'll split the goods fifty-fifty, you can even have first pick! Just please, hurry! They'll soon be putting the coffin with old Bellardo where it belongs, and then... poof! It will be reduced to ash, and my priceless augmetics along with it!"

"While there's still time, could you please get to the furnace and pull the container with implants out of there? We'll split the goods fifty-fifty, you can even have first pick! Just please, hurry! They'll soon be putting the coffin with old Bellardo where it belongs, and then... poof! It will be reduced to ash, and my priceless augmetics along with it!"

languages.text: “能不能请您趁着还有时间，去火葬场的炉子里，把装着植入物的箱子拿出来。我们可以五五分成，就算您先挑也没问题！只是求求您了，一定要快点！用不了多久，他们就会把老贝拉多的棺材送到它该去的地方，然后……呼啦！那个棺材就会化为灰烬，我那些无价的植入物也要一起完蛋了！”
languages.original_text: "While there's still time, could you please get to the furnace and pull the container with implants out of there? We'll split the goods fifty-fifty, you can even have first pick! Just please, hurry! They'll soon be putting the coffin with old Bellardo where it belongs, and then... poof! It will be reduced to ash, and my priceless augmetics along with it!"

traits.locale_text: “能不能请您趁着还有时间，去火葬场的炉子里，把装着植入物的箱子拿出来。我们可以五五分成，就算您先挑也没问题！只是求求您了，一定要快点！用不了多久，他们就会把老贝拉多的棺材送到它该去的地方，然后……呼啦！那个棺材就会化为灰烬，我那些无价的植入物也要一起完蛋了！”

languages.text: «Ahora que queda tiempo, ¿podría ir al horno y sacar el contenedor de los implantes? Nos los repartiremos a medias, ¡hasta puede elegir primero! Pronto meterán el ataúd del viejo Bellardo en su sitio y ¡puf! Quedará reducido a cenizas, ¡y con él mis valiosos auméticos!».
languages.original_text: "While there's still time, could you please get to the furnace and pull the container with implants out of there? We'll split the goods fifty-fifty, you can even have first pick! Just please, hurry! They'll soon be putting the coffin with old Bellardo where it belongs, and then... poof! It will be reduced to ash, and my priceless augmetics along with it!"

traits.locale_text: «Ahora que queda tiempo, ¿podría ir al horno y sacar el contenedor de los implantes? Nos los repartiremos a medias, ¡hasta puede elegir primero! Pronto meterán el ataúd del viejo Bellardo en su sitio y ¡puf! Quedará reducido a cenizas, ¡y con él mis valiosos auméticos!».

languages.text: 「今ならまだ間に合います…炉の中からインプラントが入ったコンテナを取り出していただけないでしょうか？商品は半分分けます。最初に選んでいただいても結構です！とにかく急いでほしいんです！まもなく亡きベラルド様が入った棺桶があの中に入れられて、大事なオーグメティックもすべて灰になってしまいます！」
languages.original_text: "While there's still time, could you please get to the furnace and pull the container with implants out of there? We'll split the goods fifty-fifty, you can even have first pick! Just please, hurry! They'll soon be putting the coffin with old Bellardo where it belongs, and then... poof! It will be reduced to ash, and my priceless augmetics along with it!"

traits.locale_text: 「今ならまだ間に合います…炉の中からインプラントが入ったコンテナを取り出していただけないでしょうか？商品は半分分けます。最初に選んでいただいても結構です！とにかく急いでほしいんです！まもなく亡きベラルド様が入った棺桶があの中に入れられて、大事なオーグメティックもすべて灰になってしまいます！」

languages.text: "Geht bitte zum Ofen, solange noch Zeit ist, und holt den Container mit den Implantaten heraus. Wir teilen die Ware zu gleichen Teilen, Ihr erhaltet sogar die erste Wahl! Aber bitte beeilt Euch! Sie werden in Kürze den Sarg mit dem alten Bellardo hineinschieben und dann ... war's das! Er wird zu Asche und mit ihm meine unbezahlbaren Augmentationen!"
languages.original_text: "While there's still time, could you please get to the furnace and pull the container with implants out of there? We'll split the goods fifty-fifty, you can even have first pick! Just please, hurry! They'll soon be putting the coffin with old Bellardo where it belongs, and then... poof! It will be reduced to ash, and my priceless augmetics along with it!"

traits.locale_text: "Geht bitte zum Ofen, solange noch Zeit ist, und holt den Container mit den Implantaten heraus. Wir teilen die Ware zu gleichen Teilen, Ihr erhaltet sogar die erste Wahl! Aber bitte beeilt Euch! Sie werden in Kürze den Sarg mit dem alten Bellardo hineinschieben und dann ... war's das! Er wird zu Asche und mit ihm meine unbezahlbaren Augmentationen!"

languages.text: « Il faudrait pénétrer dans le four et en sortir le conteneur tant qu'il est encore temps. Nous nous partagerons le contenu, cinquante-cinquante ! Je vous laisserai même choisir en premier. Mais par pitié, hâtez-vous ! Ils ne vont pas tarder à placer le cercueil du vieux Bellardo dans le four, et alors... pouf ! Il sera réduit en cendres et mes précieux augmétiques avec lui ! »
languages.original_text: "While there's still time, could you please get to the furnace and pull the container with implants out of there? We'll split the goods fifty-fifty, you can even have first pick! Just please, hurry! They'll soon be putting the coffin with old Bellardo where it belongs, and then... poof! It will be reduced to ash, and my priceless augmetics along with it!"

traits.locale_text: « Il faudrait pénétrer dans le four et en sortir le conteneur tant qu'il est encore temps. Nous nous partagerons le contenu, cinquante-cinquante ! Je vous laisserai même choisir en premier. Mais par pitié, hâtez-vous ! Ils ne vont pas tarder à placer le cercueil du vieux Bellardo dans le four, et alors... pouf ! Il sera réduit en cendres et mes précieux augmétiques avec lui ! »

languages.text: "Hâlâ vakit varken lütfen fırına gidip implantların bulunduğu zulamı oradan çıkarın. Malları yarı yarıya bölüşürüz, hatta ilk siz seçersiniz! Yeter ki acele edin! Yakında rahmetli Bellardo'nun tabutunu ait olduğu yere gönderirler, işte o zaman... Puf! Merhumla beraber benim eşsiz ogmetiklerim de kül olur!"
languages.original_text: "While there's still time, could you please get to the furnace and pull the container with implants out of there? We'll split the goods fifty-fifty, you can even have first pick! Just please, hurry! They'll soon be putting the coffin with old Bellardo where it belongs, and then... poof! It will be reduced to ash, and my priceless augmetics along with it!"

traits.locale_text: "Hâlâ vakit varken lütfen fırına gidin ve implantların bulunduğu kutuyu içinden çıkarın. Malları yarı yarıya bölüşürüz, hatta ilk siz seçersiniz! Ne olur acele edin! Yakında rahmetli Bellardo'nun tabutunu ait olduğu yere gönderirler, o zaman her şey biter! Merhumla birlikte benim eşsiz ogmetiklerim de kül olur!"
